mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memberno, id, pw, nick, tel, birth, email, memthumb, mempic, mempicsize ) VALUES (member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{pw}, #{nick}, #{tel}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{memthumb}, #{mempic}, #{mempicsize})
mapper.select: SELECT memberno, id, pw, nick, tel, birth, email, memthumb, mempic, mempicsize FROM member ORDER BY memberno
